title: A humble request regarding Pantheon's new lore.
body: Can we, at some point, have an Atreus skin? Because honestly, Atreus seems far more interesting than Pantheon does now.

replies.body: i already miss the old friendly wanna-be baker leona's sex friend

Y'know... I said when I first heard "oh, now panth is an avatar of war" that it would be way less interesting than him just being the small kid in the village who worked out a LOT... and people called me dumb.  Now, here we are.

Atreus... or old panth was a badass who trained his ASS off to overcome his flaws and become a warrior.  He was interesting.  He was batman.  He was an underdog.  He was scrappy.  

New pantheon is a generic divine warrior guy with no personality.  He's Kratos, minus Kratos' motivation and personality... what little he had.  He's boring as hell now.  I dunno how you take a character that poorly developed and make him LESS interesting, but they found a way.

I strongly agree. I hope that, with what the story provides so far, that there will be character involved with Pantheon. Like, Atreus, is not in fact dead, and is not only a shell/conduit for the Pantheon. Have him be like Diana and Leona aspect wise. Allow him to maintain character. I want to get to know Atreus more, he's fucking baller. But I'd also like to know more about the Pantheon itself. Honestly, my happy place for his new lore will be where both Atreus and the Pantheon exist inside, well, Atreus.
I mean. What would that look like? Atreus is Pantheon. They look physically the same, except Pantheon wields the spear and shield.
Presumably helmetless, maybe a slight bit less muscley. Could have a new VO, too.
Atreus IS the human shell  in which the Pantheon resides. It uses his body to traverse runeterra.
Yeah, I know that. It's reasonable to assume Pantheon is a bit more physically perfected than Atreus.

The Pantheon. based on what's read, isn't a physical entity. It's spiritual/cosmic. It possesses someone. Therefore, the physicality of this Pantheon, is in fact the physicality of Atreus. It chose Atreus due to Atreus having specific attributes. (This is what I gathered, anyways. As his Bio made sure you understood that Atreus was Determined, had willpower, and could endure through things.)

It's boring.  I'd rather play the scrappy underdog with no powers who worked hard to be a badass than the generic uber-badass divine thing of nebulous origin with no real personality, motivations or humanity.  Quite lame.

$10 says Riot completely ignores how much the community hates new {{champion:80}} 

He's even more of a joke now than he was before, and that's saying something considering he's a walking 300 reference.
What, you don't like the murderhobo? My D&D group would be crushed.

Well the Targon event is probably all written. So of course they're going to ignore it. They kind of have to. 

I also question the hatred of new pantheon. I certainly do. Go look at every one of my posts if you doubt it. But glancing through the forums I see quite a few people praising the new rendition. 

Ah well. I'd certainly be interested in an Atreus skin. Maybe give him a face and remove his glowing eyes? I want to play as this young badass from Rakkor, not some weird body snatching alien that claims to be a god. I watched an entire tv show about killing those suckers off.
